title: Manage What Exactly? Product Management by VP Product
description: What, exactly, is a Product Manager? Manage what exactly? How is Product related to UX, Tech, and Business? Colin Pal is here to demystify these questions and share his favorite hacks as a PM.
body:
What, exactly, is a Product Manager? Manage what exactly? How is Product related to UX, Tech, and Business? Colin Pal, VP Product at Photobook Worldwide, is here to demystify these questions and share his favorite hacks as a PM.

[Ticket](https://productmanagement-appclub.eventbrite.com)
